text:
Hi, 

[actually don't know if this is a bug or a property, but...]

I have Xindice installed on Mandrake 9.1 and it works fine (when hooked up).
Problems occur when I get offline and try to do excercises with Xindice. It
reports an ERROR with no content. Here is an example below:

[root@ward root]# xindiceadmin ac -c /db -n partdb2
ERROR :
[root@ward root]# xindiceadmin ac -c /db -n partdb2
Created : /db/partdb2

(I reconnected the cable after ERROR-message.)

yours, Tero
creator: tenurmin@kauppa.turkuamk.fi

text:
I think it throws XMLDBException exception with error code and no message (and
you see this empty message on the console).

I'll mark this bug as WONTFIX because no further 1.0 development will be done;
if you come across similar issue with 1.1, you can open a new bug.

Thanks,
Vadim
